review: I bought the refurbished model and it has had no problems yet! I was looking to buy an additional streaming stick because I already have the chromecast. I like that I can leave this on a TV where many people have access to and they do not have to have all of my log-in info to use different services on the TV. While HBO GO works great on a Chromecast if you have the app on your phone and the log-in set up, the Roku stays logged in for any user and it doesn't require anything from your phone. I have Chromecast for my bedroom TV but put the Roku on the TV in the living room so my roommates can also use the services I have.
author: Alicia Osen
